remarks: A normed ring is a ring with an induced topology and metric such that the metric is translation-invariant and the norm (distance from 0) is an absolute value on the ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement: df-nrg $p |- NrmRing = { w e. NrmGrp | ( norm ` w ) e. ( AbsVal ` w ) } $.
